entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
